channel.title: 2 Helps I need
channel.description:
Hey, I'm trying to make a starter pack and can someone give me the code for it? And how do you make it so that they can only do it once?
Sorry, meant to be 1

item.title: 2 Helps I need
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

[code] if (command.equalsIgnoreCase(“starter”)) {
if (starter == 0) {
addItem(995, 25000000);
addItem(392, 15000);
addItem(6528, 1);
addItem(554, 20000);
addItem(555, 20000);
addItem(565, 20000);
addItem(556, 20000);
addItem(557, 20000);
addItem(560, 20000);
addItem(561, 20000);
addItem(562, 20000);
addItem(563, 20000);
addItem(566, 20000);
addItem(558, 20000);
starter = 1;
savemoreinfo();
savechar();
} else if (starter == 1) {
sendMessage(“Sorry.”);
PlayerHandler.messageToAll = (playerName
+ " Is a noob and is trying to get a extra starter!! :p");

        }
    }[/code]

declare

public int starter = 0;

and under case 1:, you should see codes like this:

} else if (token.equals("character-lastlogin")) { playerLastConnect = (token2);

add this:

} else if (token.equals("character-starter")) { starter = Integer.parseInt(token2);

now under public boolean savemoreinfo() {

add this:

characterfile.write("character-starter = ", 0, 20); characterfile.write(Integer.toString(starter), 0, Integer.toString(starter).length()); characterfile.newLine();

Back-up your files, im sure youll get errors the first time.

Read full topic
